marytts.signalproc.analysis

Class F0Tracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • marytts.signalproc.analysis.F0Tracker
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    F0TrackerAutocorrelationDP

    public abstract class F0Tracker
extends Object
    Author:
    Marc Schröder A common basis for F0 tracking algorithms. The following main steps are assumed: 1. preprocessing of the signal 2. estimation of candidates for F0 3. selection of a path through the candidates 4. post-processing of the F0 contour
